content: संरंभः {@--1@} Beginning. {@--2@} Turbulence, impetuosity, violence; हंत वर्धंते ते संरंभः <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Agitation, excitement, flurry; <ls>Ku. 3. 48</ls>; <ls>Māl. 6. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Energy, zeal, ardent desire; <ls>R. 12. 92.</ls> {@--5@} Anger, rage, wrath; प्रणिपातप्रतीकारः संरंभो हि महात्मनां <ls>R. 4. 64</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 36</ls>; <ls>V. 2. 21</ls>; <ls n="V.">4. 28</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 76.</ls> {@--6@} Pride, arrogance. {@--7@} Swelling with heat and inflammation.
